description:
## Release (2024-12-24)

@nrg-ui/css 0.11.0 (minor)
@nrg-ui/core 0.21.0 (minor)

#### :rocket: Enhancement

#### :house: Internal

* [#311](https://github.com/knoxville-utilities-board/nrg-ui/pull/311) chore(ci): Enable auto-merge on release-plan PR ([@TSenter](https://github.com/TSenter))
